pr_title: Update jib-core default application cache dir

timeline.message:
Update jib-core default application cache dir

- in <system-tmp>/jib-core-application-layer-cache
- does not delete on exit (should help speed on rebuilds)
- shared across all builds that do not specify a custom
  application cache directory
